FuncInOutÂ¶

struct asmjit::FuncInOut
#include <func.h>

Function in/out (argument or a return value).

This class contains function argument or return value translated from the FuncPrototype.

Public Functions

uint32_t getVarType()

bool hasRegIndex()

uint32_t getRegIndex()

bool hasStackOffset()

int32_t getStackOffset()

bool isSet()

Get whether the argument / return value is assigned.

void reset()

Reset the function argument to “unassigned state”.

Public Members

uint8_t _varType

Variable type, see kVarType.

uint8_t _regIndex

Register index if argument / return value is a register.

int16_t _stackOffset

Stack offset if argument / return value is on the stack.

uint32_t _packed

All members packed into single 32-bit integer.

union asmjit::FuncInOut::@48 @49
